title: Byzantium

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit a player. If they would die tonight, you instead protect them with Invincible defense and change their win condition to the Civilization's win condition.
- Enter the Civilization factional chat with all of your converts. (Costs 8 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role is treated like an Espionage role, being unable to see the Civilization chat and not knowing who their allies are. The other Civs know that your role exists, but not who.
- The Civilization factional kill gets +1 stage of attack for each successful conversion.
- Anyone you convert joins a private chat with you. The other Civilizations are not informed when you get a conversion.
- Successfully protecting a Civilization will not enter you into their private chat, nor them into yours.
- You cannot perform the Factional Kill until you enter the factional chat or are the last Civ standing.
Messages:
"They were trampled by a Byzantine Tagma." (Factional Kill)
"You were attacked but someone protected you!" (Target when protected)
